title: BTC Monk
author: BTC Monk
content: https://scarce.city/auctions/bitcoin-freedom-artworkhttps://youtu.be/Nx1L7PM2dTA?si=P6Ccm8K070pgxVYUwww.twitter.com/btcmonk1Bitcoin Freedom artwork is authentic and one of a kind handmade 22 carat gold leaf art piece.Symbology of the artwork:Pyramid eye snake wrapped around the legs of a Samurai symbolizes centralised banking system and people behind it who are trying to control every step of our lives.A Samurai symbolizes Satoshi Nakamoto the founding father of almighty Bitcoin the symbol of financial freedom which he uses as a weapon to destroy the financial bondage placed on people by centralised banking system.Interlaced armour of a Samurai symbolizes every Bitcoin user in the world who is taking part in unbreakable code of almighty Bitcoin.Number 21 and symbol of infinity gilded on the armour of the helmet symbolizes the number of millions of Bitcoin were created and the infinite potential of its value.Numbers of Bitcoin blocks were gilded on the back side of the artwork to mark the beginning and the end of the creative process of the art piece.It took almost three hundred hours to finish this artwork.This Lot Includes:Physical Artwork:Dimensions: Without frame 99x70 cm ( 39x27 inch); with frame 104x75 cm ( 41x29 inch)Materials: Foundation was made of plywood covered with five layers of black charcoal lacquer, gilded with ninety 22 carat gold leafs and then covered with three clear lacquer layers for the finish.Weight: 6.6lbs
